main.name: Data Majority
main.description: Software house providing data analysis, forecasting of data, machine learning, big data, data visualization, and many more.
main.bio: Hello, my name is Ahmad Abdullah. I have a hobby of Programming. I am a Data Scientist and also a Python Programmer & Solutions provider. I have working experience as a freelancer in different projects. As a developer, I make modular, clean, object-oriented, and well-commented code, always aiming for quality and intelligence in the solutions. and I have 3 years experience as a Data Scientist . I started my career in Data Scientist since I was 19 years old.
